execution_plan.description: Find customers who have placed more than 2 orders and have bought at least 3 items by aggregating Orders and Order_Items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.customer_id AS s1__customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS s1__order_count, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS s1__item_count FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 2 AND COUNT(oi.order_item_id) >= 3

execution_plan.description: Retrieve id, first name and last name for customers identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.customer_id AS s2__customer_id, customers.customer_first_name AS s2__first_name, customers.customer_last_name AS s2__last_name FROM customers WHERE customers.customer_id IN ($step1.s1__customer_id)
